properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuvaa nannu karuninchumu ne ghora paapini Paapini, paapini ne ghora paapini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokaashaku longipoyi padipoyina paapini Ennikaleni paapini ne ghorapapini ne ghorapapini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anyajanula aachaaramula nabyasinchi chedipotini Ennikaleni papini ne ghorapaapini ne ghorapaapini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee vaakyamunu trosivesi dushkaaryamulu chesitini Ennikaleni papini ne ghorapaapini ne ghorapaapini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Shareeraasha, netraashanu papechhanu galgiyunti Ennikaleni papini ne ghorapaapini ne ghorapaapini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naarakshakudaa Yesu naadaa nannu neevu rakshinchitivi Ninne nityamu poojintunu Sevintu niratamu sevintu niratamu Sevintun poojintun niratamu sevintun{/lang-eng}
